text: "Pop! Goes the Weasel" is an English nursery rhyme and singing game. There are many different versions of this song. American versions include the following words: :All around the mulberry bush :The monkey chased the weasel :The monkey stopped to pull up his sock :Pop! Goes the weasel There are many other American and English versions. ==References== Category:Children's songs Category:1850s songs
title: Pop Goes the Weasel
